com.intercom.base

类 ThreadUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intercom.base.ThreadUtils

  • public class ThreadUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods to deal with threading related tasks.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setWillOverrideUiThread

        public static void setWillOverrideUiThread()

      • setUiThread

        public static void setUiThread(android.os.Looper looper)

      • runOnUiThreadBlocking

        public static void runOnUiThreadBlocking(java.lang.Runnable r)
        Run the supplied Runnable on the main thread. The method will block until the Runnable completes.
        参数:
        r - The Runnable to run.

      • runOnUiThreadBlockingNoException

        public static <T> T runOnUiThreadBlockingNoException(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> c)
        Run the supplied Callable on the main thread, wrapping any exceptions in a RuntimeException. The method will block until the Callable completes.
        参数:
        c - The Callable to run
        返回:
        The result of the callable

      • runOnUiThreadBlocking

        public static <T> T runOnUiThreadBlocking(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> c)
                                   throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Run the supplied Callable on the main thread, The method will block until the Callable completes.
        参数:
        c - The Callable to run
        返回:
        The result of the callable
        抛出:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - c's exception

      • runOnUiThread

        public static <T> java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<T> runOnUiThread(java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<T> task)
        Run the supplied FutureTask on the main thread. The method will block only if the current thread is the main thread.
        参数:
        task - The FutureTask to run
        返回:
        The queried task (to aid inline construction)

      • runOnUiThread

        public static <T> java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<T> runOnUiThread(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> c)
        Run the supplied Callable on the main thread. The method will block only if the current thread is the main thread.
        参数:
        c - The Callable to run
        返回:
        A FutureTask wrapping the callable to retrieve results

      • runOnUiThread

        public static void runOnUiThread(java.lang.Runnable r)
        Run the supplied Runnable on the main thread. The method will block only if the current thread is the main thread.
        参数:
        r - The Runnable to run

      • postOnUiThread

        public static <T> java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<T> postOnUiThread(java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<T> task)
        Post the supplied FutureTask to run on the main thread. The method will not block, even if called on the UI thread.
        参数:
        task - The FutureTask to run
        返回:
        The queried task (to aid inline construction)

      • postOnUiThread

        public static void postOnUiThread(java.lang.Runnable task)
        Post the supplied Runnable to run on the main thread. The method will not block, even if called on the UI thread.
        参数:
        task - The Runnable to run

      • postOnUiThreadDelayed

        public static void postOnUiThreadDelayed(java.lang.Runnable task,
                                         long delayMillis)
        Post the supplied Runnable to run on the main thread after the given amount of time. The method will not block, even if called on the UI thread.
        参数:
        task - The Runnable to run
        delayMillis - The delay in milliseconds until the Runnable will be run

      • assertOnUiThread

        public static void assertOnUiThread()
        Asserts that the current thread is running on the main thread.

      • runningOnUiThread

        public static boolean runningOnUiThread()
        返回:
        true iff the current thread is the main (UI) thread.

      • getUiThreadLooper

        public static android.os.Looper getUiThreadLooper()

      • setThreadPriorityAudio

        public static void setThreadPriorityAudio(int tid)
        Set thread priority to audio.
